valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 23 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: High galway 1032 expected dublin 1031 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Biscay 1015 losing its identity

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, cyclonic 4 to 6, becoming northeasterly 3 to 5 later. In northwest, northeasterly veering southerly later, 3 to 5, increasing 6 later in far west.
Sea state
In southeast, moderate or rough becoming slight or moderate. in northwest, moderate, becoming slight in east, then rough later in far west.
Weather
In southeast, showers, thundery at first. In northwest, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southeast, good occasionally poor. In northwest, good.
